reviews.review_msg: during covid, professor Punja couldn't have done it better. he made lectures enjoyable and it was easy to learn. very content heavy but he gives a lot of hints for his exams and takes feedback and changes his formatting accordingly. He was very kind and understanding of our circumstances and it was evident that he cared for us and loves his job!
The best biology proffesor ever!!! I love Dr. Punja's creative, enthusiastic teaching style! The final exam will have some questions off the practice exam!!!!
